text: so how do mental athletes match 117
faces to names by using a special memory
technique and lots of practice to
memorize names faces pick a feature on
the face that stands out to you most
accentuate that feature and then you're
going to take the person's name who
linking that name to that feature let's
use this photo for example Jack's
distinguishing characteristic is his
colorful hair so when you look at him
you might picture a rainbow then you can
connect that to his name by picturing a
baker holding a Jack of Hearts while
sliding down a rainbow try memorizing a
few of the names using this Association
technique
time is up please plant the papers and
switch them within the link just how
many names can you remember your baby
like I said it takes practice but don't
give up because I bet you still remember
this guy's name
